article: prosecutors in the trial of lynne f. stewart , a lawyer accused of aiding terrorism , rested their case thursday with a jolt to the jury , unk vicious threats against americans by a client of hers and suggesting links to osama bin laden in their evidence against her .
abstract: prosecutors rest case against sheik 's lawyer
